project.name: C-C459A-GREP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF20-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C459A-GREP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF20-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: all words beginning with e or x, case sensitive Takes an input integer and creates temporary files, filling them with a large string. It then attempts cleanup, but if more than 50 files were created, then only the last 50 will be cleaned up. Given a large enough input the program will use up a significant ammount of disk space creating temporary files and not cleaning them up.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="10" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

It then attempts cleanup, but if more than 50 files were created, then only the last 50 will be cleaned up. Given a large enough input the program will use up a significant ammount of disk space creating temporary files and not cleaning them up.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="20000" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887
if [[ $(find /tmp -maxdepth 1 -iname "stonesoup_data_459*" | wc -l) -gt 0 ]]; then echo "TEMP FILES EXIST"; else echo "EMPTY"; fi;

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_by5dUpAXpIaB8arlpRNB AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (tmp_files_exist_bCKeoAeroM) AND NOT timeout_C7N7ZqxZ0s) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((tmp_files_exist_bCKeoAeroM) OR timeout_C7N7ZqxZ0s OR controlled_exit_GMADcqHtQU)))
(NOT PERFORMER AND (tmp_files_exist_bCKeoAeroM) AND NOT timeout_C7N7ZqxZ0s) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((tmp_files_exist_bCKeoAeroM) OR timeout_C7N7ZqxZ0s OR controlled_exit_GMADcqHtQU))
